flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction: You'll need a glue gun and soldering iron. This project is very suitable for children with adult supervision appropriate to their age.
guide.introduction_rendered: You'll need a glue gun and soldering iron. This project is very suitable for children with adult supervision appropriate to their age.
guide.summary: A simple remote-controlled robotic vehicle can be constructed from items you probably have lying around the house in under an hour
guide.title: Xippy: Inexpensive and simple robotic vehicle
